Welcome to feature engine’s documentation¶

Feature Engine is a python library that contains several transformers to engineer features for use in machine learning models.

The transformers work with scikit-learn like functionality. The first learn the imputing or encoding methods from the training sets, and subsequently transform the dataset.

Currently the transformers include functionality for:

  • Missing value imputation
  • Categorical variable encoding
  • Outlier removal
  • Discretisation
  • Numerical Variable Transformation
